Articles.Content:
Hello, iv'e emailed the Ksp Support and they didn't help out allot.

so i thought i should post this question about this

I have No idea what to do iv'e emailed support and i just want to see what the public can do.

thanks!!!

By the way i play the steam version.

Edited July 16, 2017 by SunnyPlayzRb
The public can't do anything unless you follow the directions here. You didn't even describe your problems other than it's crashing.
I posted a picture of the problem. in my thread.

The picture tells me nothing more than that your game crashed and a log was created. The cause of the crash could any of 10000000 different reasons. You need to provide more information and details by following the directions in the How To Get Support thread so people can actually help you.
